about_the_game:
PLOT|
2015. Vladimir Vladimirovich is performing his duties as president of the Russian Federation, when suddenly, in the middle of the working day, aliens call. They declare that they are ready to destroy humanity, and only Vova can save the planet from ruin. Naturally, Putin accepts the challenge. But not alone - he will be helped by loyal friends, women in love with him and, of course, the people of Russia. Journey into the future, flying into space, meeting Stalin - that's what awaits you in the original game "CyberPutin 2033"!

DESCRIPTION
"CyberPutin 2033" is a story game that allows you to get into the role of the most controversial and influential politician - Putin!
The game is a mixture of many different genres, such as: arcade, quest, graphic novel and even space simulator! The main feature of the game is freedom of choice!

EXTENDED CUT
The Extended Cut is an expanded version of the game with a huge amount of innovations.
It includes a new "Who Wants to be a Billionaire?" storyline, many improvements, and an exciting walkthrough of Stalin's anti-utopia island.

GAME FOR ALL
If for some reason the game is not to your liking - you can immediately end it by rejecting the call. It will be up to you to decide.

This game is fiction by the author, any coincidences with real events and characters are accidental.

name: Путин против Инопланетян: Extended Cut (CyberPutin 2033)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9

short_description: Tyrant or savior? It will all depend on your choice!
